<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n0lnrielV61rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Giant%2BBomb%2BLIVE&channel=giantbomb&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=501295622"></object></p>

<p>Skip to the 20 minute mark in the video, sit back and enjoy the madness as the crew from <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/giantbomb"><strong>Giant Bomb</strong></a> take on your favorite space agency game in only a way they can. There’s crashes, there’s hilarity and lots of puppies. There’s some NSFW language, too, so watch out for that.</p>
